desc: Lily Lolo is a natural mineral makeup brand. We use natural, nourishing ingredients in our products, so you get flawless results without resorting to synthetic nasties. Cruelty-free, dedicated to remaining free from chemicals, parabens, perfumes or dyes. Over 95% of products are vegan friendly.

layout.text: The bold Vegan Lipstick shades you've been waiting for!
Introducing On The Rocks - Our new Eye Palette gives jewel tones a fresh edge
